name: Energy Generator 2040
description: A compact energy generator with high efficiency for use in urban environments. Powers all cybernetic implants.

name: Cyber Eyes Zorya 3000
description: High-tech cyber eyes with enhanced night vision and additional virtual reality features.

name: Anti-Gravity Boots
description: Black boots with anti-gravity technology for smooth movement in urban spaces.

name: Neon Cyber Cigar
description: A cigar with neon lighting that releases colored vapor clouds. Perfect accessory for nightclubs in the metropolis.

name: ARX-5 Interface Helmet
description: Augmented reality helmet designed for integration with cyber implants and connecting to virtual worlds.

name: Cyber Rubber Gloves
description: Protective gloves with built-in sensors for controlling technology and cyber implants.

name: Neuro-Booster
description: A device designed to enhance cognitive functions, with embedded neural implants to increase intellectual abilities.

name: Holographic Tablet
description: A super-compact tablet with a holographic interface for virtual meetings and interactive sessions.

name: Cyber Implant Charger
description: A charger designed to maintain all cyber implants in optimal condition.

name: Neon Neck Accessory
description: A neon neck accessory with built-in lighting effects, ideal for parties and nightclubs.

name: Cyber Sleep Mask
description: A sleep mask with built-in technology for better rest in noisy city environments.

name: Techno Skirts with Screens
description: Futuristic skirts with integrated screens for displaying virtual images and messages.

name: Mechanical Birds for Decor
description: Decorative mechanical birds that fly around a room using built-in technology.

name: Cyber Notebook with Virtual Assistant
description: An interactive notebook with a virtual assistant for organizing and saving data.

name: Plant Watering Robot
description: A small robot for automatically watering plants using artificial intelligence.

name: Cyber Backpack
description: An electronic backpack with sensors for protecting personal data and tracking location.

name: Tissue Regeneration Module
description: An implant designed to stimulate tissue regeneration and accelerate wound healing.

name: Pen with Scanner
description: An innovative pen combining the functions of a scanner for scanning documents and QR codes.

name: Interactive Delivery Drone
description: A small drone for delivering goods within a metropolis with autonomous navigation.

name: Cyber Security Shield
description: A personal cyber shield for protecting against hacker attacks and unauthorized access.

name: Neural Link for Thought Reading
description: A technology for directly reading thoughts and converting them into text or commands.

name: Futuristic Robot Cat
description: A robot in the shape of a cat that functions as a domestic assistant with interactive features.

name: Neon Glasses with HUD
description: Glasses with an integrated HUD (Head-Up Display) for projecting data directly into the field of view.

name: Virtual Boxing Training
description: A virtual boxing training system with support for gamepads and special gloves.
